articles.author: Cleve R. Wootson Jr.
articles.title: Trump says he ‘couldn’t care less’ if auto prices rise because of his tariffs - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Donald Trump expressed confidence that his tariff policy would prompt more Americans to buy cars made in the U.S.
articles.content: President Donald Trump said on Saturday that he couldnt care less if car prices spike because of his 25 percent tariffs on auto imports, saying the levies will prompt more people to buy American cars… [+4227 chars]
